docs.text: PPOD_Core The core modules for the PPOD (Person-Project-Organization-Dataset) schema URI: https://github.com/PPODschema/PPOD_Core# Name: PPOD_Core Classes Class Description Container A class holding the tree of all entities, needed for LinkML validation and transformation Entity Root model class for all things and informational relationships, real or imagined. Annotation A bundle of properties that is used to provide additional information or context to a statement. ReferenceAnnotation An annotation providing source information about the annotated statement. RoleAnnotation An annotation giving details on the role an agent plays with respect to another agent, for instance characterizing an is_member_of relationship. NamedThing a databased entity or concept/class Agent A person, group, organization or project that provides a piece of information (i.e. a knowledge association) Organization An agent corresponding to social institutions such as companies, societies, etc. Person A person, whether alive, dead, real, or imaginary. Project A class representing a project or collective endeavour of some kind InformationContentEntity a piece of information that typically describes some topic of discourse or is used as support. Dataset A named collection of data, usually containing only one type of data Publication Any "published" piece of information. Publications are considered broadly to include any document or document part made available in print or on the web - which may include scientific journal issues, individual articles, and books - as well as things like pre-prints, white papers, patents, drug labels, web pages, protocol documents, and even a part of a publication if of significant knowledge scope (e.g. a figure, figure legend, or section highlighted by NLP). Statement A reified RDF statement with slots for subject, predicate, and object as well as its evidence. It has similar semantics to Statements in Wikidata. AgentContactStatement A statement giving contact details for the particular agent. AddressStatement A statement giving the address of the described agent. EmailStatement A statement giving the email for the particular agent PersonContactStatement A statement giving contact details for a person, in particular the parts of their name. FirstNameStatement A statement giving the first name of the person. FullNameStatement A statement giving the full name of the person. LastNameStatement A statement giving the last name of the person. PhoneNumberStatement A statement giving a phone number for the agent. URLStatement A statement giving a URL for the agent, for instance an organizational or personal website. AgentToAgentStatement A statement describing the relationship between two agents. EmployedByStatement A statement asserting that the agent who is the subject is employed by the agent who is the object. EmploysStatement A statement asserting that the agent who is the subject employs the agent who is the object. FundingProvidedViaStatement A statement asserting that the linked entity funds this particular resource. HasMemberStatement A statement asserting that an agent has another entity as its member, for instance an organization having a person as its member. HasParticipantStatement A statement describing a relation between a process and a continuant, in which the continuant is somehow involved in the process. IsMemberOfStatement A statement asserting that an agent is a member of another entity, for instance a person being a member of an organization. ParticipatesInStatement A statement describing a relation between a continuant and a process, in which the continuant is somehow involved in the process. ProvidesFundingForStatement A statement asserting that the given agent provides funding for the associated agent. AgentToInformationContentStatement A statement describing the relationship from an agent to an information content entity. ContributesToStatement A statement describing a resource that an entity makes contributions to. CreatorOfStatement A statement asserting that the agent is the creator of a particular piece of information content HasPartStatement A statement asserting that a related resource that is included either physically or logically in the described resource. InformationContentDescriptionStatement A statement giving an attribute of a piece of information content, such as a document or dataset. AccessRightsStatement A statement giving information about who can access the resource or an indication of its security status. ContactPointStatement A statement giving relevant contact information for the cataloged resource. . DatasetDescriptionStatement A statement giving an attribute of a dataset. GeographicExtentStatement A statement giving the geographical area covered by the dataset. SpatialResolutionStatement A statement giving the minimum spatial separation resolvable in a dataset, measured in meters. TemporalCoverageStatement A statement giving the temporal period that the dataset covers. TemporalResolutionStatement A statement giving the minimum time period resolvable in the dataset. KeywordStatement A statement providing a keyword or tag describing the resource. LandingPageStatement A statement giving a web page that can be navigated to to provide access to the resource. PublisherStatement A statement describing the entity responsible for making the resource available. TypeStatement A statement giving the nature or genre of the resource, for instance the data type. InformationContentToAgentStatement A statement describing the relationship from an information content entity to an agent. ContributorStatement A statement identifying the entity responsible for making contributions to the resource. IsPartOfStatement A statement asserting entity is part of the related entity. Slots Slot Description alias alternative name for the entity annotations a list of URIs of the annotations in this database cites_work citation from one creative or scholarly work to another datasets a list of URIs of the datasets in this database date_retrieved date or point in time that information was retrieved from a database or websi... description an account of the resource end_date The end of the period has_evidence x has evidence y iff , x is an information content enouy, material entity or ... has_url URL of the entity id Canonical identifier for the entity iri An IRI for an entity is_evidence_for A relationship between a piece of evidence a and some entity b, where b is a... label A captioning label for the entity name The full name of the entity object An instance of a property that is used to state the object of a statement organizations a list of URIs of the organizations in this database persons a list of URIs of the people in this database predicate An instance of a property that is used to state the predicate of a statement projects a list of URIs of the projects in this database publication_date date or point in time when a work was first published or released publications a list of URIs of the publications in this database role_name A role played, performed or filled by a person or organization source A related resource from which the described resource is derived source_date A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the re... start_date The start of the period stated_in refers to the information document or database in which a claim is made statements a list of URIs of the statements in this database subject An instance of a property that is used to state the subject of a statement type rdf:type is an instance of rdf:Property that is used to state that a resource... Enumerations Enumeration Description AccessRightsPredicate AddressPredicate ContactPointPredicate ContributesToPredicate ContributorPredicate CreatorOfPredicate EmailPredicate EmployedByPredicate EmploysPredicate FirstNamePredicate FullNamePredicate FundingProvidedViaPredicate GeographicExtentPredicate HasMemberPredicate HasParticipantPredicate HasPartPredicate IsMemberOfPredicate IsPartOfPredicate KeywordPredicate LandingPagePredicate LastNamePredicate ParticipatesInPredicate PhoneNumberPredicate ProvidesFundingForPredicate PublisherPredicate SpatialResolutionPredicate TemporalCoveragePredicate TemporalResolutionPredicate TypePredicate URLPredicate Types Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer Jsonpath A string encoding a JSON Path Jsonpointer A string encoding a JSON Pointer Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model Sparqlpath A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... docs.text: Class: Publication Any "published" piece of information. Publications are considered broadly to include any document or document part made available in print or on the web - which may include scientific journal issues, individual articles, and books - as well as things like pre-prints, white papers, patents, drug labels, web pages, protocol documents, and even a part of a publication if of significant knowledge scope (e.g. a figure, figure legend, or section highlighted by NLP). docs.text: A reified RDF statement with slots for subject, predicate, and object as well as its evidence. It has similar semantics to Statements in Wikidata. docs.text: Slot: role_name A role played, performed or filled by a person or organization. For example, the team of creators for a comic book might fill the roles named 'inker', 'penciller', and 'letterer'; or an athlete in a SportsTeam might play in the position named 'Quarterback'.
